entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 15 TO 20 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
